TEXT.TITLE: THE ONE BANCORP <TONE> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 76 cts vs 51 cts Net 5,952,000 vs 4,374,000 Avg shrs 7,837,511 vs 7,446,356 NOTE: Includes gains of 1.3 mln dlrs vs 239,000 dlrs from benefit of tax loss carryforwards. Includes operations of Bank of Hartford, acquired Feb 23. Year-ago shr figures reflect 2-for-1 split on April 15, 1986. Reuter
